name: Suddenly Sensei
description:
Play as yourself or roleplay while building a student-tutor relationship with Nino, a beautiful young student who only has a month to improve her grades before she flunks out!

Game Features:

5 unique endings!

Enjoy a Japanese style cultural festival in-game!

📷 Collect Stickers & Photographs as you discover unique moments of gameplay!

💚🤍🖤 Aromantic friendly play: Nino will only be flirty/romantic if you are; telling her blatantly that you only want to be friends enables 'Aro mode' 

💖💜💙 Nino is an openly bisexual/biromantic character!

Several Easter Eggs!

7K words!

Average of a Grade 5 reading level!

Nearly swear-free! (1 instance of the word 'shit')

Future Planning!

Please note that Suddenly Sensei was created as part of NanoReno, which is a month long game jam!

Suddenly Sensei is currently in version 1.1, which means that it is still riddled with a host of problems that were necessary to keep in order to meet the jam deadline. That being said, we do plan to fix the current issues and add some small improvements to the game.Check out the v 1.1 patch notes for information on the current state of the game as well as some ideas about the future!

Suddenly Sensei is NeatCow Games' first game.
